newsitem.title: ITALY: Specialists make no bids for Italian Btps.
newsitem.headline: Specialists make no bids for Italian Btps.

text.p: Specialist bond traders made no bids for 150 billion lire of three-year and 150 billion lire of five-year fixed-rate bonds (BTP) offered by the Italian Treasury.
Earlier, the Treasury received bids for 3.47 trillion of three-year and 2.88 trillion of five-year Btps at an open auction, against 1.5 trillion lire each of paper on offer.
The auction prices were set at 100.25 and 99.00 respectively.
